text: Americardia is a genus of saltwater clams, marine bivalve molluscs in the family Cardiidae, the cockles.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 58. ==Species== Species within the genus Americardia include: * Americardia media (Linnaeus, 1758) -- Atlantic strawberry cockle ==References== Category:Cardiidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Americardia
